channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 12:27 Air alarm to Donetsk Region follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 12:27 Air alarm to Donetsk Region follow the following messages.#Donetsk_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 12:27 Driven the alarm to Donetsk region.Creat by further messages.

item.title: 游리 12:09 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivska Territorial Community.
item.description: 游리 12:09 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivska Territorial Community. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
